90#define AM_HAL_BLE_NVDS_CLOCKSOURCE_OFFSET 44
91#define AM_HAL_BLE_NVDS_SLEEPENABLE_OFFSET 85
92#define AM_HAL_BLE_NVDS_AGC_OFFSET 125
